AS Kigali vs APR FC

AS Kigali 1-0 APR FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:35

Umukino urangiye ku ntsinzi ya AS Kigali

APR FC yakoresheje abakinnyi biganjemo abadasanzwe babanza mu kibuga itsinzwe umukino ufungura igikombe cy'Intwari na AS Kigali. Igitego cyabotse ku munota wa 27 cyatsinzwe na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim nicyo gitandukanyije amakipe yombi

17:29

91' Coup franc nziza ya APR FC

Ku ikosa rikorewe Nizeyimana Mirafa hafi y'urubuga rw'amahina habonetse coup franc iterwa neza na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ayinyuza mu rukuta n'ubuhanga bwinshi ariko umupira ntiwamukundira unyura iruhande rw'izamu gato

17:28

Iminota itanu y'inyongera

Iminota 90 irangiye AS Kigali iyoboye umukino n'igitego 1-0 none hongeweho iminota itanu

17:26

87' Ntibisanzwe, Byiringiro Lague yagiye mu kibuga asimbuye none nawe arasimbuwe

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa afashe umwanzuro udasanzwe wo gusimbuza umukinnyi Byiringiro Lague utagize icyo ahindura nyamara nawe yari yagiye mu kibuga asimbuye ku munota wa 42

17:24

85' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Ssentongo Faruk bita Ruhinda wagaragazaga umunaniro asimbujwe Benedata Janvier ugiye guhangana na APR FC yahozemo

17:21

81' Coup franc ya APR FC ntacyo iyibyariye

Muhadjiri Hakizimana akorewe ikosa na Hererimana Rachid Leo haboneka Coup franc ayitera neza ashaka umutwe wa Sugira Ernest ariko we ntiyaboneza mu izamu atera hejuru yaryo

17:17

78' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Niyomugabo Jean Claude wakomeretse uri kwitabwaho n'abaganga asimbujwe Bizimana Djuma uri mu igeragezwa kuko iri rushanwa amakipe yose yemerewe gukoreshamo abakinnyi batatu bari mu igeragezwa

17:15

73' Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

Niyomugabo Jean Claude akorewe ikosa na Muhadjiri Hakizimana benshi baketse ko bimubyarira ikarita y'umutuku ariko umusifuzi amuhaye ikarita y'umuhondo. Iri kosa ritumye Niyomugabo ajyanwa kuvurirwa mu mbangukiragutabara

17:06

68' Gusimbuza kwa Gatatu ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Nyuma yo kunanirwa guhagarika Ishimwe Kevin, Rukundo Dennis wa APR FC avuye mu kibuga asimburwa na Michel Rusheshangoga

17:04

66' Ntwali Fiacre w'imyaka 19 gusa atabaye izamu rya APR FC

Kuba APR FC yakinnye uyu mukino idafite abakinnyi bayo babanza ku mpande bugarira Emmanuel Imanishimwe na Ombolenga Fitina bikomeje kuyigora. Ishimwe Kevin azamukanye umupira acenga Herve Rugwiro na Rukundo Dennis atera ishoti rikomeye mu izamu ariko Ntwari Fiacre usanzwe ari umunyezamu wa gatatu wa APR FC aratabara akuramo umupira ujya muri Koruneri ariko ntacyo ibyaye

16:57

59' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Sugira Ernest acomekewe umupira mwiza na Rukundo Dennis asigarana n'umunyezamu Bate Shamiru agerageje gutera mu izamu umupira ntiwamukundira ujya hejuru y'izamu

16:54

55' Muri uyu mukino Ishimwe Kevin ararindwa mubi

Umukinnyi wo ku ruhande rw'ibumoso Ishimwe Kevin afashe umupira acenga Rukundo Dennis aha umupira mwiza Faruk Ruhinda nawe uwufungiye Nsabimana Eric Zidane ariko ateye ishoti rikomeye umupira uca iruhande rw'izamu gato

16:45

46' Gusimbuza kwa kabiri ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Rutahizamu Issa Bigirimana atanze umwanya ku mukinnyi wo hagati Evode Ntwali. Barashaka kongera imbaraga hagati mu kibuga ahagaragaraga intege nke mu gice cya mbere

16:42

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

APR FC isigaranye iminota 45 ngo ishake igitego cyo kwishyura, ari nako AS Kigali irwana no kwihagararaho ngo ntiyishyurwe. Haraca uwambaye muri iki gice cya kabiri

16:26

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Iminota 45 ya mbere irangiye yaranzwe no kutitwara neza kw'abakinnyi bo hagati ba APR FC, contre attaque nyinshi no guhusha ibitego byabazwe ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali, no gusimbuza kare k'umutoza Jimmy Mulisa

16:25

48' Koruneri ya APR FC ntacyo ibyaye

Muhadjiri Hakizimana ateye koruneri nziza ashaka umutwe wa Issa Bigirimana nawe aha Iranzi Jean Claude ateye ishoti n'imoso ariko ugarurwa na Bishira Latif

16:23

Iminota itatu y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Umusifuzi wa kane Ngabonziza Patrick yongeyeho iminota itatu y'inyongera kuko 45 ya mbere yarangiye AS Kigali iyoboye n'igitego 1-0

16:21

45' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahaye umupira Sugira Ernest mu rubuga rw'amahina ariko umupira ugera mu biganza bya Bate Shamiru ahita agongana na Sugira. Uyu munyezamu wa AS Kigali ukomoka muri Uganda ahita aryama hasi avuga ko yababaye ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

16:17

42' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa ntabwo yihanganiye imyitwarire y'abakinnyi be ahise akora impinduka. Maxime Sekamana utitwaraga neza muri uyu mukino asimbujwe Byiringiro Lague

16:15

40' Jimmy Mulisa wugarijwe agiye gusimbuza

Nyuma yo kubona ko ari kurushwa cyane umutoza Jimmy Mulisa wa APR FC ahagurukije abakinnyi batatu ngo bajye kwishyushya; Lague Byiringiro, Muchel Rusheshangoga na Moustapha Nsengiyumva

16:12

36' AS Kigali yariye amavubi

AS Kigali yongeye gusatira bashaka igitego cya kabiri. Umupira uzamukanywe na Ishimwe Kevin ku ruhande rw'ibumoso, acomekera Ibrahim Nshimiyimana agerageje gutera mu izamu umupira ukubita ku kaguru ka Herve Rugwiro ujya muri koruneri, itewe Ntwari Fiacre atabara APR FC akuramo umupira.

16:09

33' AS KIGALI IFUNGUYE AMAZAMU

Nkuko twabibabwiraga APR FC yari irimo isatirwa bikomeye cyane none binatumye itsindwa igitego kare ku makosa y'abakinnyi bayo bo hagati.

Igitego gitsinzwe na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim ku mupira acomekewe neza na Nsabimana Eric Zidane, asigarana n'umunyezamu Ntwali ateye mu izamu uyu munyezamu w'imyaka 19 gusa arawugarura ariko awusubiza ku kirenge cya Ibrahim ahita asonga mu izamu. Ubu AS Kigali iyoboye umukino

16:07

31' Ikipe ya APR FC irugarijwe

Abakinnyi bo hagati ba AS Kigali barimo Tity, Zidane na Ntate Djumaine bari kurusha cyane aba APR FC barimo abamaze igihe badakina; Butera Andrew na Nizeyimana Mirafa.

Gukina kw'aba bakinnyi byatumye Imran Nshimiyimana wari umaze iminsi abanza mu kibuga adakoreshwa. Yicaye muri stade aho ari kumwe na mugenzi we Blaise Itangishaka

16:02

28' Kurarira ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Ikipe ya AS Kigali ikoze contre attaque iyobowe na Nsabimana Eric ashatse gucomekera Ibrahim Nshimiyimana bavanye muri Mukura VS, umusifuzi yemeza ko akoze kuri uwo mupira yaraririye

16:00

Uyu munsi hateganyijwe imikino ibiri

Kuri uyu munsi wa mbere w'igikombe cy'Intwari harakinwa imikino ibiri. Umukino wa APR FC na AS Kigali nurangira harakurikiraho uhuza Rayon Sports na Eticelles FC. Niyompamvu bamwe mu bakunzi ba Rayon Sports bari kwinjira muri stade. Muri bo harimo n'umunyamabanga wayo Itangishaka King Bernard uri kureba abakeba

15:58

23' Herve Rugwiro atabaye APR FC yugarijwe

Umupira uzamukanywe na Ssentongo Faruk wahoze yitwa Ruhinda awuha Ishimwe Kevin wari mu rubuga rw'amahina yitegura gutera ishoti rikomeye, umupira awukurwaho na myugariro Herve Rugwiro wari umaze iminsi adakina kubera imvune

15:54

17' Coup Franc ya AS Kigali

Ku ikosa rikorewe Nsabimana Eric bita Zidane habonetse coup franc aranayiterera ariko umupira uca iruhande gato rw'izamu rya Ntwali Fiacre uri gukina umukino we wa mbere muri APR FC

15:52

15' APR FC yiganjemo abakinnyi batabanje babanza mu kibuga ntabwo yorohewe

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa yahisemo kubanza mu kibuga abakinnyi batandatu badasanzwe bakoreshwa ari kurushwa n'ikipe ya AS Kigali yo itajenjetse

15:44

03' Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Umukino utangiranye umuvuduko ku ruhande rwa APR FC aho abakinnyi bayo bashaka igitego kare. Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahawe umupira na Butera Andrew ateye ishoti rikomeye rica hejuru y'izamu

15:42

Umukino wahawe umusifuzi ukizamuka

Umusifuzi Ngabonziza Jean Paul niwe utangije uyu mukino. Arafatanya na Karangwa Justin, Bayingana Eric, na Ngabonziza Patrick.

15:40

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi

APR FC:

Ntwali Fiacre, Rukundo Dennis, Songayingabo Shaffy, Iranzi Jean Claude, Rugwiro Herve (c), Nizeyimana Mirafa, Bigirimana Issa, Butera Andrew, Sugira Ernest, Muhadjiri Hakizimana, na Sekamana Maxime

AS Kigali:

Bate Shamiru, Harerimana Rachid Leo, Niyomugabo Claude, Ngandu Omar, Bishira Latif, Ntate Djumaine, Ishimwe Kevin, Ntamuhanga Tumaine Titi, Nsabimana Eric Zidane, Ssentongo Faruk na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim

15:39

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino ubimburira indi uri guhuza AS Kigali na APR FC. Ni nyuma yo gutsindwa na APR FC muri shampiyona umutoza Masudi Djuma agiye guhangana no kwihimura muri iri rushanwa

15:23

Umunsi w'Intwari watangiye kwitegurwa bihereye muri ruhago!!!

Igicamunsi cyiza kuri mwese. IGIHE ibabereye Kuri Stade ya Kigali ahagiye kubera umukino ufungura irushanwa ry'Igikombe cy'Intwari, cyateguwe n'Urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe Intwari, Imidari n'Impeta by'ishimwe, CHENO, ku bufatanye na Ferwafa
